sentence.text: In this work we investigated the role of forkhead box O1 (cellular response to starvation) in the transcriptional regulation in macrophages, which affects the anti-tumor functions of tumor-associated macrophages (TAMs).
Furthermore, we used FoxO1 conditional knockout epidermis development to show that FoxO1 deficiency in myeloid cells exacerbates tumor growth.

These results demonstrate that the protumoral property of TAMs is induced by the hypoxia-triggered cellular response to starvation deficiency, which could be a potential target of novel anti-tumor therapies
